Title: WindowLib
Description: WindowLib is a C++ library  used to simplify the process to create native C++ GUI's. It works similar to Windows MFC but it uses an subscription based event system similar to how forms work in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WindowLib is a C++ library used to simplify the process to create native C++ GUI's. It works similar to Windows MFC but it uses an subscription based event system similar to how forms work in C#.
